info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:35AM MST until December 26 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow at times. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches below 6000 feet with upwards of 11 inches across mountains and passes above 6000 feet. Winds gusting to 35 mph at times may produce areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Mountains from Stanley south to Picabo, including Galena Summit. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
